name: Berry Cheesecake Smoothie
description: A delicious way to shake you awake in the morning—ready in minutes and portable!

ingredients.name: Summer Berry Sweet Dip Mix
ingredients.additionalInstruction: or any Sweet Dip Mix, your choice

preparation: In a blender, purée all ingredients until smooth and frothy.
Pour into glass and serve immediately.
tips: Low-fat cottage cheese adds lean protein, which keeps you feeling full longer.
Make it Dairy Free: Replace cottage cheese with 1 serving of Power Up Vanilla Protein Blend and 1–1 1⁄2 cups of water.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 slice toast and 1 tsp nut butter.
